channel.title: Global Utmaning on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Global Utmaning on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: Nordic Urban Ways â€“ Implementing the New Urban Agenda
item.description: GlobalUtmaning on Youtube Streamed live on Dec 16, 2016 - total lenth 8 hours 28 minutes 16 December 09:00 - 18:00 ArkDes - National Center for Architecture and Design Global Utmaning, in collaboration with UN-Habitat and the National Centre for Architecture and Design, organize a full-day regional conference. Based on the study Nordic Urban Ways, Nordic cities demonstrate how they can provide good examples and lessons learned for the Nordic implementation of the Habitat III New Urban Agenda.

item.title: -Financial reform for a sustainable economy-- Part 1- Ulf Dahlsten
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3uMfTXsVbi4 Published on Feb 11, 2013 “Financial reform for a sustainable economy” is a seminar hosted by Swedish think tank Global Utmaning (Global Challenge) with keynote speaker Michael Kumhof, International Monetary Fund (IMF) and Bernard Lietaer, international expert on monetary systems and the author of the book “Money the missing link in sustainability”. Ulf Dahlsten, Global Challenge, started the seminar with an overview.

item.title: -Financial reform for a sustainable economy-- Part 2- Michael Kumhof
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YnAtHbDptj8 Published on Jan 30, 2013 “Financial reform for a sustainable economy” is a seminar hosted by Swedish think tank Global Utmaning (Global Challenge) with keynote speaker Michael Kumhof, International Monetary Fund (IMF) and Bernard Lietaer, international expert on monetary systems and the author of the book “Money the missing link in sustainability”. Michael Kumhof discussed the Chicago Plan and how to create a sustainable economy.
